snippet: The unexpected news of the arrival, on Tuesday, of the Brig Advance, which was fitted out some sixteen months since by Mr. Grinnell, of our city, for the purpose of obtaining information in relation to the expedition of Sir John Franklin, was rece...
lead_paragraph: The unexpected news of the arrival, on Tuesday, of the Brig Advance, which was fitted out some sixteen months since by Mr. Grinnell, of our city, for the purpose of obtaining information in relation to the expedition of Sir John Franklin, was received with the greatest enthusiasm and when it was known that all who had left in the Advance, and in her consort, the Rescue, were safe, the feeling of joy was unbounded.

headline.main: THE ARCTIC EXPEDITION.; The Return of the Advance--Curlesities brought Home--Incidents of the Voyage.
